name: Balid's Basics Multiplayer FANMADE
description:
This is the original Baldi's Basics but in Multiplayer!

some stuff like playtime or the principal might not work also there is 100% a lot of bugs so let me know if you find any!

DISCLAIMER: this is NOT the original build of the game its a fangame but with everything the same excpect multiplayer!

BUGS that i know about:
-playtime not moving

-principal not moving

-cannot turn while starting the game (only works after baldi gets angry)

YOU WILL NEED RADMIN VPN OR HAMACHI TO PLAY!
